positive.name: Gourmand
positive.description: Obsessed with food, cooks a lot
hooks: Gourmand 1 - I have been working on an amazing new dish, but I require a rare spice from a nearby area
Gourmand 2 - This npc offers food spiked with psychedelics

positive.name: Ascetic
positive.description: Has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments, enjoys simplicity

positive.name: Nimble
positive.description: Moves around with ease as if they are dancing

positive.name: Clever
positive.description: They are good at out-of-the-box thinking

positive.name: Open-Minded
positive.description: Doesn't judge people often, will consider even the wildest claims

positive.name: Sanguine
positive.description: Exceptionally upbeat, very difficult to lower their mood

positive.name: Optimist
positive.description: Can always find the silver lining

positive.name: Steadfast
positive.description: Mentally strong and doesn't crumble under stress

neutral.name: Night Owl
neutral.description: Is usually awake at night and asleep during the day

neutral.name: Transhumanist
neutral.description: Wants to enhance their body through artifice or magic

neutral.name: Tortured Artist
neutral.description: Feels misunderstood by other people, wants to create the greatest piece of art
hooks: Tortured Artist 1 - I have created this masterpiece, and I need it sold to a collector *artwork quality is poor*

neutral.name: Chemical Fascination
neutral.description: Loves altering their mental state with drugs and chemicals, suffers withdrawl quickly
hooks: Chemical Fascination 1 - The local dealer has cut me off, I need a new supply, or for the dealer to take me back

neutral.name: Teetotaler
neutral.description: Abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals, doesn't drink or use drugs

neutral.name: Obsessed Worker
neutral.description: Always focused on their job, starts feeling uneasy when not working

neutral.name: Lazy Worker
neutral.description: Hates their job, works slowly and would much rather be doing anything else

negative.name: Purist
negative.description: Doesn't like people people who are magically inclined
hooks: Purist 1 - One of the other townspeople has had their hand replaced with artifice/magic, take it from them

negative.name: Greedy
negative.description: Always wants more, and gets mad if they don't get it

negative.name: Jealous
negative.description: If they see something they don't have they do what they need to get it

negative.name: Pyromaniac
negative.description: They love watching and starting fires, and gets angry when they are extinguished
hooks: Pyromaniac 1 - I want to see the biggest pyre, there is a bandit hideout nearby, set it ablaze

negative.name: Wimp
negative.description: Cowers at the slightest notion of violence

negative.name: Abrasive
negative.description: Exceptionally blunt, doesn't consider peoples feelings when talking

negative.name: Creepy Breathing
negative.description: Breathes considerably heavily and sweats constantly

negative.name: Misanthrope
negative.description: Dislikes and distrusts people, believes that all actions are taken for selfish reasons

negative.name: Depressive
negative.description: Perpetually in an awful mood, very difficult to raise their mood

negative.name: Nervous
negative.description: Feels the strain fro stress more than others

negative.name: Volatile
negative.description: Even the smallest thing can make them explode, very quick to break under stress
